copyright.title: License
copyright.content: Data was collected by Penguin Statistics, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License. In case of redistribution and transformation towards the material, you must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, indicate if changes were made, and may not use the material for commercial purposes.

generating.title: Generating Site Statistics...
generating.subtitle: Neural Network Message: Due to high amount of data, site statistics need up to 5 minutes to calculate. Please come back later.

contribute.contribute_0: If you have experience with any of the following, and want to contribute to Penguin Statistics, contact us at QQ group: 747099627.
contribute.contribute_1: This is a nonprofit and open source project

skills.backend: Back End Development (Java Spring Boot, MongoDB)

failed.title: Failed to fetch resources
failed.subtitle: Unable to establish synchronized connection with neural network. Missing partial or all resources.

continue.first: Are you sure you want to submit this record?

contact.before: If you are sure you got this drop in-game, submit this report and
contact.after: Please indicate the stage name and drops. A screenshot is preferred for verification purposes. Our team will mark your report appropiately after verifying it.

causes.limitation: Your current submission has a large deviation from our existing data. This submission could be marked as a false report, removing it from our data set.

type.gte: Should have at minimum {should} items in "{stage}"
type.lte: Should have at maximum {should} items in "{stage}"
type.not: Should not have exactly {should} items in "{stage}"

closedReason.INVALID: Stage Not Found: The stage does not exist in the server you have selected.
closedReason.EXPIRED: Stage Report Closed: This activity stage has already been closed.

report.name: Report
report.gacha: Multiple results are allowed for the reports of this stage.

notices.rule_1: Report one clear at a time. Please double-check your drop selection.
notices.rule_2: If there are no drops, click submit directly without selecting any drops.
notices.rule_3: Please do not report the first-clear of a stage, and do not only report the clears where you were lucky - report all clears.
notices.rule_4: Please make sure that you refresh a 3-stars clear.
notices.rule_5: Please only submit drop data from the CN server.

report.usage: Increase drop amount by left mouse click, decrease by right click

global.notification: For performance concerns, we recommend you to use the global site {0}.

cn.notification: For performance concerns, we recommend you to use the CN mirror site {0}.

ignore.title: Ignore Mirror Notification?
ignore.subtitle: Are you sure you want to ignore all mirror optimization notifications? Performance issues may occur.

lowData.title: Low Data Mode
lowData.subtitle: Low Data Mode will stop fetching nonessential resources, such as the zone backgrounds in stage selector and the website background, to help reduce network data use.

reset.title: Reset All
reset.subtitle: This operation will delete all local data and settings you have set. After the deletion, all settings will be reset to default, all data needs to be downloaded again, and the web page will be reloaded. Are you sure to continue?

notices.autoExistence: ArkPlanner will be automatically hiding the non-existing stages.

footer.cache: The query result data now displaying is cached data. If you need to get the latest data, please "execute query" again.
footer.disclaimer: Any data produced by the "Advanced Query" function is protected by the "Data License Agreement" of this site. Penguin Statistics does not make any form of commitment or endorsement of any data produced.

item.title: Choose Item
item.subtitle: Used to filter the query results by specified materials. When any filter is selected, no other filters can be selected in the same query. If you want to filter other parameters, you can do it by adding a comparison query.

stage.title: Choose Stage
stage.subtitle: Used to filter the query results by specified materials. When any filter is selected, no other filters can be selected in the same query. If you want to filter other parameters, you can do it by adding a comparison query.

timeRange.title: Choose Time Range
timeRange.subtitle: (Required) Limit query results in a specific time range.

result.empty: This query returned 0 results. Please check your query parameters.

upgrade.title: Version Outdated
upgrade.subtitle: The current client version has outdated due to upgrade. Please retry after upgrade

dataSource.loginNotice: Please log in before viewing personal drop data.
dataSource.title: Login Required

doYouKnow: Do You Know? Ptilopsis' feather is sooo cute! o(*≧▽≦)ツ
